vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.2.2; also called Mispereth at Neh.7.7;
Also named: mis.pe.ret (מִסְפֶּרֶת "Mispereth" H4559)
§ Mispar = "number"
1) one of those who returned from exile with Zerubbabel
1a) also 'Mispereth'
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米斯拔 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "數目"
1) 隨所羅巴伯回歸的人之一 (拉2:2)
1a) 亦作 '米斯毗列'(04559)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
米斯拔 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "数目"
1) 随所罗巴伯回归的人之一 (拉2:2)
1a) 亦作 '米斯毗列'(04559)
